item.title: In 2018, Dubai drew in more than 1,000 residents with a net worth of over a million dollars
Best investment migration programmes for wealthy individuals
item.description: The increased global demand for residence and citizenship-by-investment programs, particularly among wealthy investors, highlights the desire to overcome limitations posed by single jurisdictions in the wake of COVID-19. Recognizing this, Deep Knowledge Analytics and Henley & Partners have collaborated to create the Investment Migration Programs Health Risk Assessment. Source: Henley & Partners website. Illustration for the Investment Migration Programs Health Risk Assessment. This digital publication provides a detailed analysis, interactive tools, and unique perspectives on the efficiency of countries offering these programs during the pandemic, and their potential as future havens for longevity.

item.title: Henley & Partners has been selected as the worldwide concessionaire for the Thai residency program
item.description: Henley & Partners, a global firm specializing in residence and citizenship advisory, has been chosen to promote Thailand’s residence visa program, Thailand Elite. This program allows foreigners to reside in Thailand for up to 20 years. Thailand’s welcoming atmosphere has made it a desirable destination in Southeast Asia. Individuals and families from affluent nations are increasingly drawn to its climate, scenery, and recreational opportunities. The 2017 “Best Countries” report highlighted Thailand as a prime location for starting a business due to its affordability, efficient bureaucracy, and accessible capital.
